author: Jacob Dressler
description:
One Marvel character that fans have been anxious to see make their MCU debut for years now has been Blade. Of course, Mahershala Ali voiced the character for a quick cameo in Eternals, but fans want to see the character physically appear on screen. Now Blade has made his MCU debut in that very way [...]

The post Blade Makes MCU Debut – Without Mahershala Ali appeared first on ScreenGeek.
title: Blade Makes MCU Debut – Without Mahershala Ali

author: Jacob Dressler
description:
Netflix subscribers tend to gravitate towards newer releases when it comes to the massive streaming platform. However, one classic horror movie has been making rounds as subscribers rediscover the title. Now, more than three decades after its initial release, this monumental horror movie is proving it’s just as relevant as ever via Netflix. It’s only [...]

title: Netflix Viewers Rediscover Classic Horror Movie Over 30 Years After Release

author: Jacob Dressler
description:
Fans have been rather unhappy by ABC’s decision to suspend Jimmy Kimmel and pull his series Jimmy Kimmel Live! from broadcast. In fact, with the series essentially canceled for the time being, She-Hulk star Tatiana Maslany is one of many speaking out. Maslany has even called for a boycott of Disney in defense of Kimmel.
